entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
